name: Parkour Game [V. 0.1]
description:
(I don't have a real name for the game yet lol) - So yea, the core mechanics of this game will be the movement.

Please don't hate me, I just started with this project so there is not so much to see yet but I am trying to spend as much time as possible developing :)

I'm trying to keep it easy to use and intuitive while still having a lot of ways to combine abilities.

Controls:

WASD - Movement [duh...]

Spacebar - Jump, double-jump [tap]

Spacebar - float [hold]

Q / E - Dash UP / Forward [has cooldown]

PS.: gimme feedback pls (if you have any at this early point lol) thank you :)

PPS.:    :)

Music used:

  •  Kai Engel - Chance
  • Kai Engel - Run
  • Kai Engel - Seeker
  • Kai Engel - Sentinel
  • To Eris - To Eris - Social Blast
